name: Mother32
author: gawrone
description:
The
 palette is based on a tetradic scheme (or more likely double 
complementary). Strong, deep blues are opposed by weak browns and strong
 bloody reds are opposed by weak turquoises (obviously). Greish violets 
are trying to bring the contrasts together. Made for this piece: 
https://lospec.com/gallery/gawrone/mother
